attributes.action: Refrain from SECRET negotiations for EU QMV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to our attention that you intend to circumvent the WILL of the electorate, by negotiating away, in secret, our National Right to VETO EU legislation and recommendations,which might impinge on our RIGHTS, TRADITIONS and CONSTITUTIONAL FREEDOMS.

You are requested to desist in this course of action.
